hero.title: Welcome to Khulega.online
hero.subtitle: Your one-stop destination for services, shopping, and career opportunities.
hero.desc: One solution for every need of your online business

stories.name: Village Women
stories.text: A group of women in a small village had a home business but no documents to sell online. Khulega.online helped them — got their documents ready and onboarded them on Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho and more.

stories.name: Ramesh — Makhana Seller
stories.text: Ramesh used to sell Makhana from his village, only in the local market. With Khulega.online's help, he and his old friends now sell Makhana online across India.

stories.name: Usha — New Brand, New Identity
stories.text: Usha had no brand. We created a brand for her, designed the packaging, and listed her on all marketplaces. Today, Usha has her own identity.
stories.alt: Usha's brand created and selling everywhere
